name: DailyProverbs2
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: These are interesting times with the Coronavirus, and having to adopt a new normal to our daily lives. Daily Proverbs 2 is reaching further to help you gain wisdom that will help you through each day. We all want wisdom. There are 31 chapters in the wisdom book of Proverbs. So, every day of each month, listen to the corresponding chapter for that day. Having it repeat every month will be a way for you to dig down into it the more you hear it. May it become a part of you as you live out your day.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
